question: The strength of a base depends on the concentration of _______ it produces when dissolved in water?

nodes.text: Combustion ions are the concentration that determines the strength of a base when dissolved in water.
Calcium ions are the concentration that determines the strength of a base when dissolved in water.
Monoxide ions determine the strength of a base when dissolved in water.
Hydroxide ions are the concentration that determines the strength of a base when dissolved in water.
